item.title: Arch Linux install with UEFI and encrypted disk
item.description: Several times I had to install Arch Linux those 8 past years. Not because it’s not stable but because I changed hardware. Any time it was a pain to remind me how to do stuff during the install process. I really love this Linux distribution, but I have to admit the install process is far complex that what we found on other distribution. I never did a how to and once again I wasted my time on reading the doc etc…but I just wanted to go fast.
